information.name: Date Calendar with Calendar Auto function
information.description: Uses the Calendar Auto DAX function to generate a data calendar.
information.author: Mike Carlo

mappings.name: YourQuickMeasure
mappings.description: Name of the measure DAX generator will create (click to modify)

mappings.name: Description
mappings.description: Add a description for this measure. (click to modify)

encoding.expression:
GENERATE (
    CALENDARAUTO(),
    VAR currentDay = [Date]
    VAR day = DAY( currentDay )
    VAR month =  MONTH ( currentDay )
    VAR year =  YEAR ( currentDay )
    RETURN
        ROW ( 
            \"day\", day,
            \"month\", month,
            \"year\", year 
        )
)

instructions: 1. Chose a name for your measure clicking on 'Measure name'
3. Click on 'Create / update' button to create a measure in your model
4. Click on 'Debug' button to start a debug session with DAX debugger
